Registration Day

Registration day is coming!

Posted by Art Club on August 11, 2021

【𝐇𝐊𝐔 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐃𝐚𝐲】ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ


———————————————

𝗛𝗞𝗨 𝗥𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗗𝗮𝘆 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟭

- 𝘼𝙧𝙩 𝘾𝙡𝙪𝙗 -

𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗲: 𝟭𝟱/𝟴 - 𝟭𝟳/𝟴

𝗩𝗲𝗻𝘂𝗲: 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝟭/𝗙

𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲: 𝟵:𝟯𝟬𝗮𝗺 - 𝟲:𝟯𝟬𝗽𝗺

———————————————


今日Jupas 放榜啦！！恭喜曬各位fm bb 入到HKU！！一齊成為港大人嘅一分子！٩(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)۶ ☺️☺️❤️🙆🏻‍♀️😘

入到大學，除咗享受Ulife同埋讀書之外，可能你都會想join一啲cultural activities，所以…

Tada~ 🤗🤗

一年一度嘅Reg day就黎到喇！🌈🔥 諗好左要reg咩soc/club未呢( ˘͈ ᵕ ˘͈ )

鍾意美術嘅你，梗係要黎reg Art Club member啦♥︎來年各種精彩嘅workshop一定啱味啱曬你 ♪~ Hmm.. 太多選擇未諗好？咁記得黎揾我地！等我地同你傾下偈，俾你了解多啲啦(ノ)`ω´(ヾ)😍🥰

記住記住！我地喺Art Club booth等你 *ˊᵕˋ)੭ ~♥︎


Art Club 每年都會有welfare pack 🎁送返我哋members😝🤤 大家可以swipe去後面睇welfare products😙

另外今年我地仲有幸得到唔同公司嘅贊助😋🤤🙆‍♀️想攞走呢個咁靚嘅welfare pack？

🤩🤤😍 記住嚟我哋個booth到 reg member 啊🙆‍♀️😎🥳 （🤫～到時仲有神秘禮物添😗😉）到時見！～ (´꒳`)


❤️☺️ Congratulations to all HKU freshmen! When planning for your university life, apart from your studies, I’m sure you’ll also be interested in some more fun and creative activities…

GOOD NEWS - Reg day is coming!!! Have you decided on which societies you want to register for ( ˘͈ ᵕ ˘͈ ) ?

If, like us, you are an art fanatic, look no further: you must come and join us by registering for Art Club membership! That way, you won’t miss any of our exciting upcoming workshops. ( ∗°⌓°∗ )♡

Remember to stop by our booth on Reg Day — we look forward to meeting you soon! *ˊᵕˋ)੭ ~


Every year, new members receive a welfare pack 🎁😍 Swipe to the next few pages to take a peek at the welfare products 😉

Also, a big thanks to the companies who have sponsored us! 😋🤩 Want a free welfare pack? 

Don't miss our booth and come register for Art Club membership! 🤤 (p.s. more secret goodies may just be waiting for you! 🤫) Hope to see you there~ 🙆‍♀️❤🧡💛💚💙💜
